text: "Blood, Sweat & Tears" is a song by American singer Ava Max, released as a promotional single through Atlantic Records. It was released on July 31, 2019, alongside another promotional single "Freaking Me Out". A lyric video was released on the same day. The song was written by Max, Peter Thomas, Sofia Hoops and producer Cirkut. ==Background== The song leaked online in late 2018. It was initially the second official single from Max's debut album Heaven & Hell, but was later scrapped in favor of "So Am I". ==Track listings== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Czech Republic (Rádio Top 100) | 60 |} ==References== Category:2019 songs Category:Ava Max songs Category:Songs written by Ava Max Category:Songs written by Cirkut (record producer) Category:Song recordings produced by Cirkut (record producer)
title: Blood, Sweat & Tears (Ava Max song)
